text: Eti veruyushchiye, kotorym My obeshchali pomoch' oderzhat' pobedu, - yesli My ikh ukrepim na zemle, - budut khranit' pravednuyu svyaz' s Allakhom i s lyud'mi, budut regulyarno vystaivat' molitvu, kak polozheno, razdavat' ochistitel'nuyu podat' (zakyat) tem, kto zasluzhivayet yeyo, i budut prikazyvat' lyudyam sovershat' dobrodeyaniya i uderzhivat' ot zlodeyaniy. Allakhu Yedinomu prinadlezhit zaversheniye vsekh del. On Svoyey mudrost'yu pomogayet, komu pozhelayet, i unizhayet, kogo pozhelayet
